underlying_goal: To perform a large-scale documentation cleanup and then auto-generate a large number of new experiment specification files.
primary_success: Automating the creation of 18 detailed, self-contained experiment specification files by writing and executing a Python generator script, saving a huge amount of manual effort.
brief_summary: The user first provided a 10-step plan to fix documentation drift in experiment specs, which Claude executed precisely. Then, Claude created a Python script to programmatically generate 18 new experiment specs based on a cartesian product of methods, datasets, and models, successfully automating a massive documentation task.
